body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Cast Annex LAnd onto target land
2. hit "back" twice
3. Annex Land is back in your hand, the land is back on opponent's side but an Annex Land card is still attached What is the expected output? What do you see instead? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). magarena 1.48.827 Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Annex Land: casting + hitting the back button twice won't remove the enchantment

comments.body:
Conquer {3RR} does the same. 

Cast Conquer on opponent's land
Hit back twice
The land is returned but a Conquer card is still attached.
comments.author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)

comments.body: Strangely enough, Yavimaya Enchantress does not count these fake cards. Seems to me, that only the image stays attached to opponents land, not an untriggered copy of the card itself.
comments.author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision ed268166317f .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/) on March 13, 2014 23:37:35_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Cast Annex LAnd onto target land
2. hit "back" twice
3. Annex Land is back in your hand, the land is back on opponent's side but an Annex Land card is still attached What is the expected output? What do you see instead? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). magarena 1.48.827 Please provide any additional information below.
